name: FNF FNAF Test
description:
FNF FNAF TEST

We have Friday Night Funkin' fans, and we have Five Nights at Freddy's fans. One is a Rhythm game, one is a Horror game.

But, why not have both in a single game? That's what you will find in Funkin' Nights at Freddy's, an awesome game with Crying Child (Evan Afton), Fredbear Plush, Freddy Fazbear, Funtime Freddy & Bon Bon, Ennard, and Springtrap.

Friday Night Funkin and Five Nights at Freddy's = ❤️

Now you can test all the characters from FNAF in an FNF type game. You will have some hidden animations and 1 cutscene where you will see Boyfriend get scared by Freddy.

Credits:

  • Created by: Scott Cawthon
  • Devs: DragonessAnimations
  • Art, Animation, Extra Coding: Jova
  • Composer, Music Editing, Extra Credits: 
  • Scott Cawthon - Original creator and copyright owner of Five Nights at Freddy's.
  • KadeDeveloper: Kade Engine

Useful links:

  • GameBanana: https://gamebanana.com/wips/53715
  • FNAF: https://fnafar.com/
  • Play original mod online: https://www.play-games.com/game/27337/funkin-nights-at-freddys.html

So, what do you think about this one?
